mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, status, ifnull(perms, '') as perms, create_time from t_menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.create_time from t_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.status, ifnull(m.perms, '') as perms, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.create_time from t_menu m left join t_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join t_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join t_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join t_user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select m.menu_id from t_menu m left join t_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select distinct m.perms from t_menu m left join t_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join t_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from t_menu m left join t_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join t_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join t_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = '1' and r.status = '1' and ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from t_menu m left join t_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where m.status = '1' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_menu( menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, component, menu_type, status, perms, remark, create_by, create_time )values( #{menuId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{menuType}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
